LogColors.py – colors to be used in a log¶

Platforms: Unix, Linux

Module author: Jordi Carrillo <jordilin@jordiet.com>

LogColors class¶

class LogColors.LogColors¶

Defines the colors that will be used to tail the logs. By default it defines the next colors:

  • warn = yellow
  • info = green
  • debug = black
  • error = magenta
  • fatal = red
parseConfig(configfile)¶

Parses the config file containing user defined color levels. The config file must be specified in the following format:

  • warn = yellow
  • info = green
  • debug = black
  • error = magenta
  • fatal = red

If any of the levels is missing, log4tailer will grab the default ones.
